org.batfish.specifier

Interface SpecifierContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SpecifierContextImpl

    public interface SpecifierContext
    Collects all the information about the network that is needed by NodeSpecifiers, LocationSpecifiers, and IpSpaceSpecifiers to resolve themselves.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      Get the IpSpace owned by the input interface.

        @Nonnull
java.util.Set<NodeRole> getNodeRolesByDimension(java.lang.String dimension)

      • getInterfaceOwnedIps

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,IpSpace>> getInterfaceOwnedIps()
        Returns:
        the IpSpaces owned by each interface in the network. Mapping: hostname -> interface name -> IpSpace.

      • getInterfaceOwnedIps

        default IpSpace getInterfaceOwnedIps(java.lang.String hostname,
                                     java.lang.String iface)
        Get the IpSpace owned by the input interface.
        Parameters:
        hostname - The node the interface belongs to.
        iface - The name of the interface.
        Returns:
        The IpSpace owned by the interface.

      • getVrfOwnedIps

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,IpSpace>> getVrfOwnedIps()
        Returns:
        the IpSpaces owned by each VRF in the network. Mapping: hostname -> VRF name -> IpSpace.

      • getVrfOwnedIps

        default IpSpace getVrfOwnedIps(java.lang.String hostname,
                               java.lang.String vrf)
        Get the IpSpace owned by the input VRF.
        Parameters:
        hostname - The node the VRF belongs to.
        vrf - The name of the VRF.
        Returns:
        The combined space of IPs owned by the VRF's interfaces.
